item.description:
March 23 - April 1 is Newport Restaurant Week !

I've scheduled an "extra" March dinner to celebrate at 22 Bowen's on Bowen's Wharf in Newport RI.

22 Bowen's will offer a special 3-course prix fixe dinner menu for $30 (not including beverages, tax and tip).

The prix fixe menu has not been posted on their website yet but they are going to email me a copy of the menu shortly and I will post it for you.

We will only be ordering off of the prix fixe menu for this meetup

Check out their website:

http://www.22bowens.com/
item.how_to_find_us: I've made a reservation in my name

group.name: Rhode Island Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Newport Restaurant Week Dinner - 22 Bowen's
